channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- NextGEN Gallery
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- NextGEN Gallery

item.title: CVE-2024-2744|2024-05-17T06:00:02.141Z -- Unknown -- NextGEN Gallery
item.description: The NextGEN Gallery WordPress plugin before 3.59.1 does not sanitise and escape some of its settings, which could allow high privilege users such as admin to perform Cross-Site Scripting attacks even when unfiltered_html is disallowed
